text: Pro golfer Bill Haas and actor Luke Wilson were both involved in a fatal car crash in California. Los Angeles police tell KTLA that Haas, 35, was a passenger in a Ferrari that was involved in a head - on collision with a BMW Tuesday evening in Pacific Palisades, Calif. The driver of the Ferrari, a 71 - year - old man who has not been identified, was pronounced dead at the scene. The Ferrari also rolled over in the crash, according to the Los Angeles Fire Department. According to USA Today, Haas and the BMW driver, a 50 - year - old woman, were both taken to the hospital.
